'''Alpha v1.2.4_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] that was released with [[Alpha server 0.2.6 02|server 0.2.6_02]] on November 30, 2010, which fixed a bug{{verify|was this not a testing feature?}} causing only creepers to spawn.<ref>[[wordofnotch:2050336602|Bug update #3.]] – The Word of Notch, November 30, 2010</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* All mobs can spawn again, not just creepers.</onlyinclude>
